metadata.title: I'll Play The Blues For You

songInfo.album:
from Live (Rhino 71622) & Albert Live (Charly 35) & Travelin' to California (Polydor 2343026) &
Tomato Years (Rhino/Tomato R2 71623) &
Chicago 1978 (Charly 754) & Blues at Sunset (Stax SCD-8581-2) ,

lyrics.l: If you're down and out and you feel real hurt
Come on over to the place where I live
And all your loneliness I'll try to soothe
I'll play the blues for you
Don't be afraid come on in
You might run across some of your old friends
All your loneliness I gotta soothe
I'll play the blues for you
I got no big name and I ain't no big star
I play the blues for you on my guitar
All your loneliness I'll try to soothe
I 'll play the blues for you
